          at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.apps.viewer.ToolTipPNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable, Serializable, Cloneable
public class ToolTipPNode
extends edu.umd.cs.piccolo.nodes.PText

Displays a tool-tip window displayed on mouse-over events in the SOMPane. This class makes use of the Piccolo framework.

Version:
$Id: ToolTipPNode.java 3358 2010-02-11 14:35:07Z mayer $
Author:
Michael Dittenbach
